vocabulary.definition: a thing that motivates or encourages someone to do something
vocabulary.example: The company offered a cash bonus as an incentive for meeting sales targets.

vocabulary.definition: gradually but firmly establish (an idea or attitude) in a person's mind
vocabulary.example: Parents try to instill good manners in their children from a young age.

vocabulary.definition: a feeling of anxiety or discomfort
vocabulary.example: There was a sense of unease among the employees as rumors of layoffs spread.

vocabulary.definition: make (suffering, deficiency, or a problem) less severe
vocabulary.example: Taking a hot bath can help alleviate muscle pain after a workout.
